name: P.P. Hammer and His Pneumatic Weapon
summary: P. P. Hammer and his Pneumatic Weapon is a platform game with puzzle elements. It draws obvious influence from the earlier game Lode Runner. In the game, you control a character called P. P. Hammer, who is on a quest to discover and acquire all treasures from a series of more than 60 levels. These levels are divided into four graphical themes: Ancient Rome, Ancient Egypt, Medieval castles, and ice. A fifth theme, LegoLand, appears on bonus levels. Each level in the game is made up of rectangular blocks, and contains various things including treasures, enemies, locked doors, bonus items and traps. P. P. Hammer carries a jackhammer, which allows him to drill through a block he's standing next to. As in Lode Runner, drilling through more than one layer of blocks requires creating a triangle-shaped cavity more than one block wide, and blocks reappear after a short while. A block reappearing on top of P. P. Hammer kills him. P. P. Hammer can collect treasures and various power-up potions lying around the level. When he has collected all the treasures, the exit door opens, and going through the exit door completes the level. The player doesn't have to play from the beginning of the game every time; after completing each level a level password is displayed, allowing the player to continue from that point at a later time.

name: PPKP
summary: Suddenly the monster corps attacks and breaks the city. Be the hero who will revive the city while taking down monsters.

name: PPDD
summary: This is an innovation fighting action game that you apply the counter-attack after avoiding the enemy's attack by the simple operation only with cross keys. Since the enemy's attack sign is expressed visualiy,you'll not receive unreasonable damage and can avoid all attacks if you are an expert.

name: ppL: The Animated Adventures
summary:
A challenging 2D platformer with hard boss fights and unique mechanics. Contains several bosses and platformer levels.
Includes two difficulties, different weapon choices, different paths of passing through the game and a lot of surprises...

name: PP Puncher
summary: PP Puncher is a turn-based RPG, mostly text-based, about a guy going on a quest to save his waifus, by punching his opponents' PP. The game stacks new game mechanics to the fight system, as the player progresses into the game.

name: Ppoi: Hitonatsu no Keiken
summary: Ppoi: Hitonatsu no Keiken is a PlayStation 2 game by Otomate.

name: Pporite
summary: Abandon the tedious and systematic cultivation action rouge game, choose the right fruit and skills to cultivate the nearby Pporite, and skills react with Pporite, skills and skills to protect yourself until the arrival of 20 minutes...

name: PPP
summary: PPP is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you solve your way out. There are 20 different enjoyable levels where each of them offers unique experience.

name: PP
summary: This is a "butt" as the protagonist of the breakthrough game Players will take the role of a pink ass in a hurry to go to the toilet. Dodge all kinds of fast food attacks on the way, break through the obstacles and finally reach the toilet!

name: PPAP: The Game
summary: PPAP: The Game is a rhythm action mobile game released on Line based on Pikotaro's PPAP music video.

name: P.P.SH
summary: As a player you'll step into the shoes of either a foreign subversive agent or an Albanian patriot, each with their own mission objectives. Will you infiltrate a key facility, engage in high-stakes firefights, or coordinate with fellow players to spark a rebellion against the oppressive regime?

name: PPA Pickleball Tour 2025
summary: PPA Pickleball Tour 2025 is the most advanced pickleball game ever produced!
